http://www.netdrive.com/~blueinblue/

Download GLADIATOR: BEYOND FREEDOM.

INSTRUCTIONS ARE BELOW, THE FOLLOWING ARE NOTES YOU
SHOULD YIELD TO.  ROAR

Here it is.  Please take note that only scenario 3, scenario 111, and
scenario 112
are working.  You access scenarios by "Select Level" in the big menu.  Level
1
won't work, so set your level to level 3 if you must.

The download is nearly 17MB at this point, so you might want to do this
during
the night time, when you won't need all that your connection can squeeze.

If you'v eplayed the original Gladiator, it works much the same.  Hope you
guys
enjoy it, I know I did. :)  The music is awesome.

-Chris / Shayd

PS -- Do we have any girls on this list?  I don't know about you, but I
would find
a girl who played gladiator irresistible.

INSTRUCTIONS:

1) Go there.

2) Click on the "GO TO PUBLIC FILES" button.
 ... You will see something very familiar to windows users.

3) On the left frame click on the "My Public Files" button.

4) In the right frame, right-click glad_bf.zip

5) Choose "save target as" or "save link as" (depending if you are using
Netscape or Internet Explorer).

6) Select where you want to download it.

-WAIT-

7) Use an unzipping application to unzip the ENTIRE zip to one directory.
(www.winzip.com is where you can find one, then return here after installing

it.)

8) PLAY.
